caption: Language Model Configuration
description: Configures the MCP server for Language Model support.
name: language_model

model.caption: Model Name
model.description: Name of the Language Model including its version (e.g., 'gpt-3.5-turbo').

api_base.caption: API Base URL
api_base.description: URL of the API base for the Language Model (e.g., 'https://api.openai.com/v1').

env_vars.description: Environment variables, such as API key for accessing the Language Model, if required by the provider.
